questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A beach
C) A forest trail
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) A trail
D) A river

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Buildings
B) Mountains
C) Trees
D) Cars

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Water
B) Grass and trees
C) Sand
D) Rocks

B) Pine trees
C) Deciduous trees
D) Bare-branched trees

A) Full of leaves
B) Bare and sparse
C) Covered in snow
D) In autumn colors

A) Concrete
B) Sand
C) Gravel
D) Wood

B) Bushes
C) Tall grass

D) Paved

B) Brown
C) Black
D) Blue

A) Bright and vibrant

A) Yes
B) No

Are there any animals visible in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

B) Rough
